member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO
member.summary: A module that uses shift registers to give the user 32 outputs, for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer.

example.para: The following example uses a object to write to a few of the 32 available outputs. At the end of the example, each alternating pin will be high, with the others low.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.GetArraySize
member.summary: Returns the size of the array to be filled out.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.WriteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Writes the full array of data to the registers.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.WritePin(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Writes only to the specified pin or the specified board.
member.param: The number of the board to write to.
The number of the pin to write.
The value to write to the pin.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.Read
member.summary: Returns the data that is currently in the registers.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.DisableOutputs
member.summary: Disables the output to the pins.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.MaxO.NumBoards
member.summary: The number of this type of module attached together
